posts.title: Game Boy - Setup
posts.description: Provide setup instructions for programming a Game Boy Advanced SP using the C programming language.

posts.title: A Simple File System
posts.description: Example of creating a simple file system using the C programming language. The file system will allow users to list directory entries, rename files, copy files, delete files, as well as read/write/open/close files.

posts.title: Arduino Uno Oscilloscope
posts.description: Overview of how to turn an arduino uno into a basic oscilloscope using operational amplifier circuits.
